result.html: An bhfaca tú a mháthairHave you seen his mother?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfaca tú a ṁáṫairHave you seen his mother?

result.eng: I said goodbye to my mother and left.
result.ga: D'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh mé
result.orig: D'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh mé
result.html: D'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh méI said goodbye to my mother and left.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág mé slán ag mo ṁáṫair agus d'imiġ méI said goodbye to my mother and left.

result.html: Seo mo mháthairThis is my mother.
result.ponchtml: Seo mo ṁáṫairThis is my mother.

result.eng: The mother is on her knees praying.
result.ga: Tá an mháthair ar a glúine ag guí
result.orig: Tá an mháthair ar a glúine ag guí
result.html: Tá an mháthair ar a glúine ag guíThe mother is on her knees praying.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ṁáṫair ar a glúine ag guíThe mother is on her knees praying.

result.ga: Tá tú cosúil le mo mháthair
result.orig: Tá tú cosúil le mo mháthair
result.html: Tá tú cosúil le mo mháthairYou are like my mother.
result.ponchtml: Tá tú cosúil le mo ṁáṫairYou are like my mother.

result.html: Conas tá do mháthairHow is your mother?
result.ponchtml: Conas tá do ṁáṫairHow is your mother?

result.eng: Dónal is the father and Áine is the mother.
result.ga: Is é Dónall an t-athair agus is í Áine an mháthair
result.orig: Is é Dónall an t-athair agus is í Áine an mháthair
result.html: Is é Dónall an t-athair agus is í Áine an mháthairDónal is the father and Áine is the mother.
result.ponchtml: Is é Dónall an t-aṫair agus is í Áine an ṁáṫairDónal is the father and Áine is the mother.

result.ga: Is í an bhean sin a mháthair
result.orig: Is í an bhean sin a mháthair
result.html: Is í an bhean sin a mháthairThat woman is his mother.
result.ponchtml: Is í an ḃean sin a ṁáṫairThat woman is his mother.

result.eng: I get on better with my father than with my mother.
result.ga: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthair
result.orig: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthair
result.html: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthairI get on better with my father than with my mother.
result.ponchtml: Réitím níos fearr le m'aṫair ná le mo ṁáṫairI get on better with my father than with my mother.

result.eng: Are you living with your mother?
result.ga: An le do mháthair atá tú i do chónaí
result.orig: An le do mháthair atá tú i do chónaí
result.html: An le do mháthair atá tú i do chónaíAre you living with your mother?
result.ponchtml: An le do ṁáṫair atá tú i do ċónaíAre you living with your mother?

result.eng: My mother's aunt is living with us as well.
result.ga: Tá aintín le mo mháthair ina cónaí linn chomh maith
result.orig: Tá aintín le mo mháthair ina cónaí linn chomh maith
result.html: Tá aintín le mo mháthair ina cónaí linn chomh maithMy mother's aunt is living with us as well.
result.ponchtml: Tá aintín le mo ṁáṫair ina cónaí linn ċoṁ maiṫMy mother's aunt is living with us as well.

result.eng: My mother and father are from Belfast.
result.ga: Is as Béal Feirste do mo mháthair agus m'athair
result.orig: Is as Béal Feirste do mo mháthair agus m'athair
result.html: Is as Béal Feirste do mo mháthair agus m'athairMy mother and father are from Belfast.
result.ponchtml: Is as Béal Feirste do mo ṁáṫair agus m'aṫairMy mother and father are from Belfast.

result.eng: It hurt me that my mother should be begging.
result.ga: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirce
result.orig: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirce
result.html: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirceIt hurt me that my mother should be begging.
result.ponchtml: Ġoin sé mé go mbeaḋ mo ṁáṫair ag lorg déirceIt hurt me that my mother should be begging.

result.eng: It was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.orig: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.html: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ionaḋ gurḃ é an saol acadúil a ḃí i ndán don ḃuaċaill óg agus a ṁáṫair ina doċtúir leiġisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.

result.eng: His mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ga: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.orig: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.html: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sé lena ṁáṫair ar ġreim láiṁe go teaċ na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.

result.ga: A mháthair mhór is tú a chan an fhírinne
result.orig: A mháthair mhór is tú a chan an fhírinne
result.html: A mháthair mhór is tú a chan an fhírinneYou were right, grandma.
result.ponchtml: A ṁáṫair ṁór is tú a ċan an ḟírinneYou were right, grandma.
